name: Regulation of ambulances
text: §321-227  Regulation of ambulances.  The department of health shall adopt, amend, and repeal rules under chapter 91 for the regulation of ambulances within the State, including but not limited to the certification of vehicles, equipment, supplies, and communications systems.  Any person who provides emergency medical service as an employee of any emergency ambulance service shall be subject to chapter 453. [L 1978, c 148, pt of §1; am L 1984, c 168, §4]
